edu.dhbw.t10.type.keyboard.key
Class ModeKey

java.lang.Object
  edu.dhbw.t10.type.keyboard.key.Key
      edu.dhbw.t10.type.keyboard.key.ModeKey

public class ModeKey
extends Key

ModeKey represent a mode such as shift, that can be referenced to ModeButton. It saves to current state, all observers (the Buttons, which have a shift mode) and all connected ModeButtons.

Author:
NicolaiO

 void push()
          Push the occording Mode (like shift) and trigger all connected ModeButtons and normal Buttons Toggle the state ( DEFAULT => PRESSED => HOLD => DEFAULT )
 void register(Button b)
          Register a Button as an observer, so that the Button can be informed of a status change
